_sText:
UPDATE @ 2008 Oct 19,
An update has been made against the pumpkin lit texture, the light beam of its specific models will now light up properly in the dark Please re-download the package and overwrite all existing files. This package contains 11 models:
  • 1 scarecrow model
  • 10 pumpkins' models
    the models are named:
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_l.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_l\_face1.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_l\_face2.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_m.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_m\_face1.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_m\_face2.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_s.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_s\_face2.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_xl.mdl
  • hallo\_pumpkin\_xl\_face1.mdl
  • hallo\_scarecrow.mdl I made this models for the Halloween (or zombies maps). The models are not, yet, too perfect, in fact, the scarecrow was stretched up into a painfully long modelling period because of the "mis-purpose" texturing. After all, it was all re-patched and i decided to release these models. It is up to you/mapper to use it or not. There will be an update version(redesign) of these models, but the timetable of redesigning is not clear yet. ALL models have multiple skins, hallo_scarecrow contains 4 skins. The pumpkins models with no face on it only have 2 skins. The ones with faces have 4 skins as well which is the result of a 2 x 2 combination. In the combinations, skin families feature cross-combine 2 outer pumpkin skins and lit/dim skins. See attachments images for more detail. Though it may not be clear in words, please feel free to open Half Life Model Viewer to view the skins. In total, all pumpkins models will generate 32 different views with the multiple skins. The scarecrow model will only have 4 different views. Mr. Kit 2008 Oct 5 _________________________ All models are stated "$staticprop" in qc files for compiling, further prop type can be made if requested. All models are provided with proper physics box(hit box). LODs are provided to avoid lag No animation involved polycount of different models: pumpkins: 200 - 600 scarecrow: 1200 Software used: PS CS3, Lightwave 9.5 Installation Instructions:
    Straight forward, simply extract the rar/zip file into cstrike folder, so that the paths: 
    x:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\USER\counter-strike source\cstrike\models\models\_kit
x:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\USER\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials\models\models\_kit
    are both containing the files and valid directory Please respect the right that i made these models. You are allowed to change the texture image, but my name "Mr. Kit" MUST be credited, either tagged onto texture image, written into a readme file or written as the map's credit. You are also welcome to distribute these models, also feel free to use them on your custom map. You are supposed to give me, Mr. Kit, credit while publishing your map. Please send me an email(kwbingo@yahoo.com.hk or kwbingojp@yahoo.co.jp) stating the name of your map when you release it to public, so that i can see how good/bad the models react in-game. To see more of my models pack, please click on my name "mrkit4423" and click submission. Please don't hesitate to email(or pm) me if you have any problems or requests. My email address are kwbingo@yahoo.com.hk or kwbingojp@yahoo.co.jp
